pkgmetadata.longdescription: Observational Database Study Planning using Exact Sequential Analysis for Poisson and Binomial Data // Functions to be used in conjunction with the 'Sequential' package that allows for planning of observational database studies that will be analyzed with exact sequential analysis. This package supports Poisson- and binomial-based data. The primary function, seq_wrapper(...), accepts parameters for simulation of a simple exposure pattern and for the 'Sequential' package setup and analysis functions. The exposure matrix is used to simulate the true and false positive and negative populations (Green (1983) doi:10.1093/oxfordjournals.aje.a113521, Brenner (1993) doi:10.1093/oxfordjournals.aje.a116805). Functions are then run from the 'Sequential' package on these populations, which allows for the exploration of outcome misclassification in data.
